COMMAND.NAME: deletemenu
COMMAND.PARAMETER: menuPathList Is a Tcl List that specifies which menu should be deleted.
menuPathList... More than one menu may be deleted in a single call.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Delete the menus at the end of menuPathList.
COMMAND.STATUS:
The deletemenu command will return an error in the following cases:
menuPathList is not provided.
menuPathList is not a valid e93 menu path.
